alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 2:34PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Saguache County through 315 PM MDT... At 234 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Saguache, or 20 miles southwest of Decker Burn Scar, moving southeast at 5 mph. Developing thunderstorms are also developing to the west under similar conditions. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saguache. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
